spender of parties said balance","_user":"address of party with the balance"},"return":"Returns the remaining allowance of tokens granted to the _spender from the _user"},"allowedToTrade(OldTellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,uint256)":{"details":"This function returns whether or not a given user is allowed to trade a given amount  and removing the staked amount from their balance if they are staked","params":{"_amount":"to check if the user can spend","_user":"address of user"},"return":"true if they are allowed to spend the amount being checked"},"approve(OldTellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,uint256)":{"details":"This function approves a _spender an _amount of tokens to use","params":{"_amount":"amount the spender is being approved for","_spender":"address"},"return":"true if spender appproved successfully"},"balanceOf(OldTellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address)":{"details":"Gets balance of owner specified","params":{"_user":"is the owner address used to look up the balance"},"return":"Returns the balance associated with the passed in _user"},"balanceOfAt(OldTellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,uint256)":{"details":"Queries the balance of _user at a specific _blockNumber","params":{"_blockNumber":"The block number when the balance is queried","_user":"The address from which the balance will be retrieved"},"return":"The balance at _blockNumber specified"},"doTransfer(OldTellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Completes POWO transfers by updating the balances on the current block number","params":{"_amount":"to transfer","_from":"address to transfer from","_to":"addres to transfer to"}},"getBalanceAt(OldTellorStorage.Checkpoint[] storage,uint256)":{"details":"Getter for balance for owner on the specified _block number","params":{"_block":"is the block number to search the balance on","checkpoints":"gets the mapping for the balances[owner]"},"return":"the balance at the checkpoint"},"transfer(OldTellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,uint256)":{"details":"Allows for a transfer of tokens to _to","params":{"_amount":"The amount of tokens to send","_to":"The address to send tokens to"},"return":"true if transfer is successful"},"transferFrom(OldTellorStorage.TellorStorageStruct storage,address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"_amount":"The amount of tokens to be transferred","_from":"The address holding the tokens being transferred","_to":"The address of the recipient"},"return":"True if the transfer was successful"},"updateBalanceAtNow(OldTellorStorage.Checkpoint[] storage,uint256)":{"details":"Updates balance for from and to on the current block number via doTransfer","params":{"_value":"is the new balance","checkpoints":"gets the mapping for the balances[owner]"}}},"title":"Tellor devdoc.details: Contais the methods related to transfers and ERC20. Tellor.sol and TellorGetters.sol reference this library for function's logic.

params._spender: address of spender of parties said balance
params._user: address of party with the balance

allowance(OldTellorStorage.TellorStorage.return: Returns the remaining allowance of tokens granted to the _spender from the _user

allowedToTrade(OldTellorStorage.TellorSt.details: This function returns whether or not a given user is allowed to trade a given amount  and removing the staked amount from their balance if they are staked

params._amount: to check if the user can spend

allowedToTrade(OldTellorStorage.TellorSt.return: true if they are allowed to spend the amount being checked

approve(OldTellorStorage.TellorStorageSt.details: This function approves a _spender an _amount of tokens to use

params._amount: amount the spender is being approved for

params._user: is the owner address used to look up the balance

balanceOf(OldTellorStorage.TellorStorage.return: Returns the balance associated with the passed in _user

balanceOfAt(OldTellorStorage.TellorStora.details: Queries the balance of _user at a specific _blockNumber

params._blockNumber: The block number when the balance is queried
params._user: The address from which the balance will be retrieved

doTransfer(OldTellorStorage.TellorStorag.details: Completes POWO transfers by updating the balances on the current block number

getBalanceAt(OldTellorStorage.Checkpoint.details: Getter for balance for owner on the specified _block number

params._block: is the block number to search the balance on
params.checkpoints: gets the mapping for the balances[owner]

transfer(OldTellorStorage.TellorStorageS.details: Allows for a transfer of tokens to _to

params._amount: The amount of tokens to send
params._to: The address to send tokens to

params._amount: The amount of tokens to be transferred
params._from: The address holding the tokens being transferred

transferFrom(OldTellorStorage.TellorStor.return: True if the transfer was successful

updateBalanceAtNow(OldTellorStorage.Chec.details: Updates balance for from and to on the current block number via doTransfer

params.checkpoints: gets the mapping for the balances[owner]

devdoc.title: Tellor Transfer

transferFrom(OldTellorStorage.TellorStor.notice: Send _amount tokens to _to from _from on the condition it is approved by _from
